page.title: 07MOBILE SERVICES
page.content: There are an unusual number and variety of travelling services in the area. Different services go to the villages than to the isolated homes on the outskirts.Hepworth and Jackson Bridge have most services.A grocer and green grocers van come twice a week,so does the wet fish van.Other services which come weekly are the Baker, Library,Video Van, and the Clinic.The WVS Meals on Wheels went to the older people in the villages and they thought they were very good.In the more isolated areas like Victoria the greengrocer came once a week.The other services available are baker, butcher, hairdresser, papers, post, and farm bottled milk. There is also a farm implement and garage tool mending service. Laundry and dry cleaning is collected and up until 1984 there was a mobile corset service!
